pages.text: Some people just can't help themselves from punching trees. With a little encouragement they will be required to use an axe to chop any form of log. Enable/Disable in the config.

pages.title: Tree Chopping
pages.text: You may notice that some axes will cut the whole tree down for you (at a modified speed)! This applies to any tools in #rankine:tree_choppers, which contains all the alloy axes from Rankine by default. Only logs will be felled for now, so feel free to install your preferred leaf decay mod. Sneaking prevent tree chopping. See config for options.
